Name: Aeris&Zack
About the game: Due to an error in the world tree, the three goddesses of fate found me and asked me to help and that I could be granted a wish. I need to defeat 3 out-of-control holy beasts to make their re-entry into the world tree. This beautiful world is full of crises, but you can explore freely just like a trip to relax, and you can also play a variety of mini-games, happy to spend the game time. PS: EA stage may have some bugs, please focus on feedback in the feedback post in the community.On average, it is updated once every 2 weeks. PS: You need to turn off the graphics card sharpening or anti-aliasing function. PS: Highly recommended to play with the handle.
